channel.title: [508] [Bulby] Change the Block thingy
channel.description: I'm using TinyScape, As I'm the friend of it's creator and i need to know how to change the blocking thing.. When wearing a shield it blocks normaly instead of lifting both arms up in the air.. It's kinda annyoing.

item.title: [508] [Bulby] Change the Block thingy

item.description:

you gotta add the animation and like something to know if it’s holding a shield. Use an array or something for the sheilds
